Text: Busy Philipps:  She has also performed significant roles in films like "The Smokers" (2000), as Karen Carter, the drama film "Home Room" (2002) as Alicia Browning, she appeared in "White Chicks" (2004), played a supporting role in "Made of Honor" (2008) and appeared in "He's Just Not That Into You" (2009).
